body:
**Describe the bug**
The java code has incorrect mappings for CSV parsing. For several types.

All of the time deltas are wrong and  we indicate that we support "list" and "struct" which we do not.

At a minimum the time delta types need to be updated, but ideally we modify the code so the strings are not stored in the enum any more, but are instead stored as a mapping in the CSV reader.

This is still an issue and should be addressed, but it is not a high priority

title: [BUG] the java DType class has incorrect mappings for CSV parsing
